EmailTemplate.name: WBN-EMEA-2019-04-11 Container Adoption.ES- 20190220-Invite . 1.Email A
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar: Benchmarking Container Adoption
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
According to Gartner, there’s a 50% chance your organization will be running containerized applications by 2020. How will you and your team overcome the roadblocks you’ll encounter on the way to deployment and management in production?
Register Now <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-container-adoption-2/?utm_campaign=7012o000001oRxj]]>
Join the Benchmarking Your Container Adoption in 2019 <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-container-adoption-2/?utm_campaign=7012o000001oRxj]]> webinar on April 18th at 11am BST where Eva Tuczai, Advanced Solutions Manager, Containers at Turbonomic for a discussion around:
- Current adoption trends - Best practices learned from IT pros that are running containers in production today - The implications for multi-cloud deployments - And more!
Register now and compare yourself with your industry peers.
Thanks, Andrew
PS. If you can't attend, register anyway <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-container-adoption-2/?utm_campaign=7012o000001oRxj]]> and we will send you the recording afterward.
